verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are God alone, you are God and none compares (2x)
Your grace is sufficient to carry me home
You are God alone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My life is in your hands
Lord I surrender to your plan
as you're fashioning and forming me
into the image of your Son
You are God alone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You lift me up on eagle's wings
high above the storm
your peace pierces through the darkness of night
you are God alone.
